Package gr.aueb.dmst.pijavaparty.proderp.GUI.orders

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddItemSOrder
    AddItemSOrder.java - A graphical user interface (gui) class responsible for adding a new order to a supplier - Select the raw material and enter the quantity for the selected raw material.
    AddNewCustOrder
    AddNewCustOrder.java - A graphical user interface (gui) class responsible for adding a new order from a customer - Select the customer's id and name and then shows the graphical user interface (gui) of AddProductToCOrder class.
    AddNewSOrder
    AddNewSOrder.java - A graphical user interface (gui) class responsible for adding a new order to a supplier - Select the supplier's id and name and then shows the graphical user interface (gui) of AddItemSOrder class.
    AddProductToCOrder
    AddProductToCOrder.java - A graphical user interface (gui) class responsible for adding a new order from a customer - Select the product and enter the quantity for the selected product.
    EditCOrders
    EditCOrders.java - A graphical user interface (gui) class for modifying the status of an order from customers and delete an order to customers.
    EditSOrders
    EditSOrders.java - A graphical user interface (gui) class for modifying the status of an order to suppliers and delete an order to suppliers.
    OrdersFrame
    OrdersFrame.java - A graphical user interface (gui) class for showing the menu for orders, with the available options, Orders To Suppliers and Orders From Customers.
    OrdersFromCustomers
    OrdersFromCustomers - a graphical user interface (gui) class for choosing to update, delete, add the data of an order from customer, or show all the products included in a customer's order.
    OrdersFromSuppliers
    OrdersFromSuppliers - a graphical user interface (gui) class for choosing to update, delete, add the data of an order to supplier, or show all the raw materials included in a supplier's order.
    ShowProductsOfOrder
    ShowProductsOfOrder.java - A graphical user interface (gui) class for showing all the products included in an order from customers with a specific order id - shows the product id, the product name and the quantity of this specific product.
    ShowRawMaterialsOfOrder
    ShowRawMaterialsOfOrder.java - A graphical user interface (gui) class for showing all the raw materials included in an order to suppliers with a specific order id - shows the raw material's id, the raw material's name and the quantity of this specific raw material.
